definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Lamp, Bumper, Mirror, Hood, Fender, Frame of water tank.
sentences.chinese: 大灯，保险杠，倒车镜，机盖，叶子板，水箱框架。

sentences.english: The light produced by bi-xenon headlamps is very similar to daylight .
sentences.chinese: 复式氙气大灯发出的光非常接近于日光。

sentences.english: Bi-xenon headlights, dynamic headlight range adjustment, with fixed bending light.
sentences.chinese: 双氙气大灯，照明范围自动调节，带静态弯道照明。

sentences.english: Street lights and car headlights are fuzzy.
sentences.chinese: 街灯和汽车大灯都模糊不清。

sentences.english: A panorama sunroof and bi-xenon headlights will follow at a later time.
sentences.chinese: 全景天窗和双氙大灯将在稍后的时间。

sentences.english: This front lamp applies to 6460 auto vehicle , welcome to order .
sentences.chinese: 此大灯适用于6460双环来旺车系，欢迎订购。

sentences.english: Pull the two electric connectors apart and remove the headlamp unit.
sentences.chinese: 拉开两个电气接头，然后拆下大灯单元。

sentences.english: The lights and lenses are excellent, including Hella H4 headlamps .
sentences.chinese: 灯光和镜头是很好的，包括海拉H4大灯。

sentences.english: Another special feature is adaptive bi-xenon headlights.
sentences.chinese: 另一个特殊功能是自适应双氙大灯。

sentences.english: Check that the headlamp unit is seated securely.
sentences.chinese: 检查大灯单元是否牢固入位。

sentences.english: The now moonless sky was drenched with bursts of light from big lamps.
sentences.chinese: 没有月亮的天空，沐浴在大灯的光芒下。

sentences.english: And for goodness' sake, don't drive down a dark road with burned-out headlights or taillights.
sentences.chinese: 务必记住，不要黑着大灯或尾灯开到黑咕隆咚的路上。

sentences.english: When headlight is switched to the brightest, the brightness of screen is switched to the lowest.
sentences.chinese: 当大灯开到最亮挡，屏幕调节到最暗的亮度。

sentences.english: The flat tall and slender head lamp headlamp is glowering likely.
sentences.chinese: 扁平细长的大灯像在怒目而视。

sentences.english: The intensity and alignment of a headlight must be within the specified limits.
sentences.chinese: 强度和一个大灯的排列必须在规定的极限。

sentences.english: However, you may replace the existing headlight with white headlight bulb which emits a white light.
sentences.chinese: 然而，你可能取代现有的大灯灯泡与白灯发射白光。
